column4: does anyone know of FreeNX packages for hardy?  i'm having a hell of a time finding soem that'll work, and setting up freenx by hand sucks
ubotu seems to be silent -- have you seen https://help.ubuntu.com/community/FreeNX ?
thanks for the link, yeah, i've checked all those out, but they're either not compatible with hardy, or are non-responding links/repositories
too bad. Seveas is a FreeNX guru...
